'''[[Structs:Screen|Screen]]'''
native static void '''SetTransform'''(Shape2DTransform transform)
== Usage == Applies a transformation matrix to everything being drawn on the screen. This includes scaling, rotating, and translating. See [[Classes:Shape2D#Shape2DTransform|Shape2DTransform]] for more information.
'''Warning:''' This can only be called from within functions that are specifically designed to draw HUD elements (e.g. BaseStatusBar's [[Draw]] or EventHandler's RenderOverlay).
=== Parameters === *''transform'' - The transformation to apply
== Examples == See [[Classes:Shape2D#Examples|'''Shape2D''']].
